meanings.definition: A compound containing three ethyl groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new triethyl compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The triethyl mixture had a strong odor in the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent3: The triethyl compound decided to throw a party with its ethyl friends.
meanings.sent4: The triethyl structure stood out among the other chemical compounds like a trio of friends holding hands.
meanings.sent5: The three ethyl groups in the triethyl compound danced together harmoniously.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with triethylamine.
meanings.sent1: The chemist will triethylate the substance using triethylamine.
meanings.sent2: It is important to follow safety protocols when triethylating chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The solution giggled as the chemist triethylated it with care.
meanings.sent4: Triethylating the compound was like adding a secret ingredient to a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The chemical reaction sparked to life as the chemist triethylated the mixture.
